snippet: Miguel Ángel Aguilar said his column in El País, Spain’s leading newspaper, was canceled after he was quoted questioning its editorial independence in an article in The New York Times.
abstract: Longtime journalist Miguel Angel Aguilar claims Spanish newspaper El Pais canceled his column after he criticized country's media in New York Times article for bowing to government and business influence.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Ángel Aguilar said his column in El País, Spain’s leading newspaper, was canceled after he was quoted questioning its editorial independence in an article in The New York Times.

headline.main: El País Columnist Says Dismissal Tied to His Criticism of Media Independence
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Spain: Newspaper Cancels a Column
